location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江西省西南部
location.en: Southwestern Jiangxi Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江西省西南部的一座山脉，地处湘赣边界的罗霄山脉中段。它曾是中国共产党创建的第一个农村革命根据地，因此被称为“革命摇篮”。
description.en: A mountain range in southwestern Jiangxi Province, China, in the middle section of the Luoxiao Mountains on the border of Hunan and Jiangxi. It was the site of the first rural revolutionary base established by the Communist Party of China, thus known as the 'cradle of the revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民银行发行的面值为100元的人民币纸币。其第四套的背面图案采用了井冈山五指峰的风景。
description.en: A banknote of the Chinese renminbi with a denomination of 100 yuan, issued by the People's Bank of China. The reverse side of its fourth series features the scenery of the Wuzhi Peak in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东、朱德等人于1927年10月创建的中国共产党第一个农村革命根据地。
description.en: The first rural revolutionary base of the Communist Party of China, established in October 1927 by Mao Zedong, Zhu De, and others.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，在井冈山地区建立了其第一个革命根据地。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, which established its first revolutionary base in the Jinggang Mountains area.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。他率领部队在井冈山建立了第一个革命根据地。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. He led troops to establish the first revolutionary base in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，中国人民解放军的创始人和领导者。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a founder and leader of the People's Liberation Army. He participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，中华人民共和国元帅。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a Marshal of the PRC. He participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，中华人民共和国元帅。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地，并于1930年因杀害袁文才、王佐而被迫率部撤离。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a Marshal of the PRC. He participated in establishing the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base and was forced to withdraw his troops in 1930 after killing Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，中国人民解放军高级将领。他参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a senior general of the People's Liberation Army. He participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国内革命战争时期领导的武装力量，参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的资产阶级民主革命。井冈山革命根据地的建立开辟了“农村包围城市，武装夺取政权”的道路。
description.en: The bourgeois-democratic revolution led by the Communist Party of China. The establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base opened up the path of 'encircling the cities from the countryside and seizing power by armed force'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1928年秋创作的一首词，描述了井冈山的斗争生活。
description.en: A ci poem written by Mao Zedong in the autumn of 1928, describing the struggle and life in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1965年重访井冈山时创作的一首词。
description.en: A ci poem composed by Mao Zedong in 1965 when he revisited the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共赣西特委书记，他的指示导致彭德怀杀害了袁文才和王佐。
description.en: Serving as the Secretary of the Western Jiangxi Special Committee of the CCP, his instructions led Peng Dehuai to kill Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo.

description.zh-cn: 井冈山地方武装首领，后加入红军。1930年被彭德怀杀害。
description.en: A local armed leader in the Jinggang Mountains who later joined the Red Army. He was killed by Peng Dehuai in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 井冈山地方武装首领，后加入红军。1930年被彭德怀杀害。
description.en: A local armed leader in the Jinggang Mountains who later joined the Red Army. He was killed by Peng Dehuai in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江西西部的特别委员会。时任书记朱昌偕曾向彭德怀下达错误指示。
description.en: The special committee of the Communist Party of China in western Jiangxi. Its secretary at the time, Zhu Changxie, gave erroneous instructions to Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于中国工农红军的一支部队，由彭德怀领导。在袁文才、王佐被杀害后，该部队被迫撤出井冈山。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army led by Peng Dehuai. After the killing of Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo, this unit was forced to withdraw from the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，井冈山位于其江西省境内。
description.en: A country in East Asia. The Jinggang Mountains are located within its Jiangxi province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，井冈山位于其西南部。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, where the Jinggang Mountains are located in the southwest.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份，与井冈山所在地江西省接壤。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China, bordering Jiangxi where the Jinggang Mountains are located.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省和江西省边界的山脉，井冈山是其一部分。
description.en: A mountain range on the border of Hunan and Jiangxi provinces in China, of which the Jinggang Mountains are a part.

description.zh-cn: 井冈山五指峰的风景被用作第四套人民币100元纸币的背面图案。
description.en: The scenery of Wuzhi Peak in the Jinggang Mountains was used as the design for the reverse side of the 100 yuan banknote of the fourth series of RMB.

description.zh-cn: 1927年10月，毛泽东率领中国工农红军在井冈山创建了第一个革命根据地。
description.en: In October 1927, Mao Zedong led the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army to establish the first revolutionary base in the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 朱德参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: Zhu De participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: Chen Yi participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: Peng Dehuai participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 滕代远参与创建了井冈山革命根据地。
description.en: Teng Daiyuan participated in the establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军在井冈山地区建立了革命根据地。
description.en: The Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army established the revolutionary base in the Jinggang Mountains area.

description.zh-cn: 井冈山革命根据地的创建开辟了一条以农村包围城市、武装夺取政权的的新民主主义革命道路。
description.en: The establishment of the Jinggangshan Revolutionary Base opened up a path for the New Democratic Revolution, characterized by encircling cities from rural areas and seizing power through armed struggle.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1928年秋创作了词《西江月‧井冈山》。
description.en: Mao Zedong wrote the ci poem 'To the tune of Xijiangyue - Jinggangshan' in the autumn of 1928.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1965年重上井冈山时创作了词《水调歌头·重上井冈山》。
description.en: Mao Zedong composed the ci poem 'To the tune of Shuidiaogetou - Reascending Jinggangshan' during his return visit to the Jinggang Mountains in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 朱昌偕时任中共赣西特委书记。
description.en: Zhu Changxie was serving as the Secretary of the Western Jiangxi Special Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀听信了朱昌偕的指示，导致了杀害袁文才和王佐的事件。
description.en: Peng Dehuai acted on the instructions of Zhu Changxie, which led to the killing of Yuan Wencai and Wang Zuo.

description.zh-cn: 1930年2月24日，彭德怀下令杀害了袁文才。此事导致袁文才的部众反水，彭德怀的红五军被迫撤出井冈山。
description.en: On February 24, 1930, Peng Dehuai ordered the killing of Yuan Wencai. This incident caused Yuan's followers to rebel, forcing Peng Dehuai's Red Fifth Army to withdraw from the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 1930年2月24日，彭德怀下令杀害了王佐。此事导致王佐的部众反水，彭德怀的红五军被迫撤出井冈山。
description.en: On February 24, 1930, Peng Dehuai ordered the killing of Wang Zuo. This incident caused Wang's followers to rebel, forcing Peng Dehuai's Red Fifth Army to withdraw from the Jinggang Mountains.

description.zh-cn: 红五军由彭德怀领导。
description.en: The Red Fifth Army was led by Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军是中国共产党领导的武装力量。
description.en: The Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army was the armed force led by the Communist Party of China.
